metadata.title: CVE-2019-17567 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Apache HTTP Server versions 2.4.6 to 2.4.46 mod_proxy_wstunnel configuredon an URL that is not necessarily Upgraded by the origin server wastunneling the whole connection regardless, thus allowing for subsequentrequests on the same connection to pass through with no HTTP validation,authentication or authorization possibly configured.

criterions.comment: apache2 package in trusty is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
apache2 package in trusty is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
